key.name: panel-position
key.description: Where to show the indicator in the panel (0=left, 1=center, 2=right, 3=Far Left, 4=Far Right)

key.name: show-info-tip
key.description: Show a tip explaining different control behavior when the extension is enabled

key.name: artwork-themed-ui
key.summary: Use artwork colors for UI theme
key.description: If enabled, the extension dynamically changes UI colors based on the dominant colors of the current track's album artwork

key.name: download-folder
key.description: The directory where downloaded songs will be saved. You can set an absolute path or use ~ for the home directory.

key.name: volume-step
key.description: The amount the volume changes when scrolling the top panel label. Value should be between 0.01 and 1.0 (1 = 100% volume).
